import React from 'react'; import { Box, Container, Typography, Grid, Button, Paper } from '@mui/material'; import './contact.css'; const Contact = () => { return (
{/* Hero Section */} Support Our Mission Your generosity enables us to continue our work and make a lasting impact in the communities we serve. {/* Giving Options */} {/* Donation Option 1 */} Give via QR Code Scan the QR code with your mobile device to make a quick and secure donation. {/* Donation Option 2 */} Online Giving Use our online platform to make a donation with your credit card or PayPal. {/* Donation Option 3 */} Mail-In Donation Prefer to send a check? Mail your donation to our office address.
); }; export default Contact;
